description: This file contains the implementation of a singly linked list data structure, including methods to add, remove, retrieve size, and get elements by index.

classes.name: LinkedList
classes.description: A singly linked list class with basic list operations such as add, remove, size, and get.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds a new element to the end of the linked list.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes the first occurrence of the specified element from the list.

methods.name: size
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in the list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index.

methods.name: unlink
methods.description: Unlinks a node from the list during removal.
